description: Had a productive 30-minute call with Sarah about the enterprise package. She's very interested and wants to schedule a demo for her team.
Sent detailed proposal and pricing information to Michael for the platform integration project.
Initial discovery meeting with Emily to understand Growth Ventures' operational challenges and requirements.
David mentioned they're looking for a solution that can scale with their rapid growth. Emphasized our startup-friendly pricing model.
Contract signing meeting with Lisa. Deal officially closed! They're excited to start implementation next month.
Brief check-in call with Robert about compliance requirements. He's reviewing our security documentation.
Followed up with Sarah after our call. Sent calendar invite for next week's team demo.
Completed research on Digital Solutions' tech stack and recent funding. Ready for next conversation with David.
